title: India Total Passenger Vehicles Sales
description: Total Vehicle Sales in India decreased to 291113 Units in October from 307389 Units in September of 2022. Total Vehicle Sales in India averaged 186165.72 Units from 2002 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 323443 Units in October of 2016 and a record low of 44163 Units in April of 2002. This page provides - India Domestic Vehicle Sales- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: SIAM - Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers
